pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-Sample Test in High Dimensions using Random Projection // Performs the random projection test (Lopes et al., (2011) doi:10.48550/arXiv.1108.2401) for the one-sample and two-sample hypothesis testing problem for equality of means in the high dimensional setting. We are interested in detecting the mean vector in the one-sample problem or the difference between mean vectors in the two-sample problem.
